name: v2 Specimen Source Codes
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0070 ( Specimen Source Codes)

property.description: The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

concept.display: To be specified in another part of the message

designation.value: Wordt gespecificeerd in een ander deel van het bericht
